sentences.sContent: He makes his own point in his own inimitable way.
sentences.sCn: 他以他独有的的方式阐述了自己的观点。

synos.tran: 独特的；无比的；无法仿效的

trans.tranCn: 独特的；无比的；无法仿效的
trans.tranOther: You use inimitable to describe someone, especially a performer, when you like or admire them because of their special qualities
